TEXT: A strange locksmith. NL Ascends the Spire in search of greater evil magic.
NL You prepare your greatest keys...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and hisses in fear. NL ~"D-do~ ~you~ ~need~ ~use~ ~of~ ~our~ ~powers,~ ~evil~ ~one?."~
